snippet.title: Castles - Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Castles is an action puzzle game, set in a fantasy medieval world. Up to two players have to build the highest tower in the kingdom, matching blocks of materials and construction tools, and facing problems like weather and giant bosses. 

http://badlandindie.com/castles/

Castles ©2016 WhootGames Published by Badland Games. Developed by WhootGames. All rights reserved.
